reviews.text:
This is the best zoo I have ever been to.
The spaces for the animals are really big and they seem so relaxed. There are lots of activities for the children as well, and all the shows throughout the day are simply fantastic.
I am going back again and again every year, and always discover something new.
We love it!

Spacious park with high focus on animal welfare. There is a good variation of amusements activities besides watching animals in the summer(high season) and a relatively new water park all taking the pressure away from the animal parts of the park. Best time of year to visit though, is in the winter time :)

A lot of fun for the children. There are many parks to play in. And it is really nice to see all these exotic animals in Norway. Most of the resturants are closed now in the winter time, but all the animals are still here. They have done a really nice job with the park.
Good place but not easy to see many animals. They also have special timings when you can see them. So needs good planning to visit this place.
Great value, best zoo I have been to in terms of animal welfare. All the animals looked very happy and taken care of.

Sehr schönes Mitmach-Museeum für Jung und Alt. Super nette Mitarbeiter. Man sollte sich ruhig ein bisschen mehr Zeit mitnehmen, da die Kids dort lange basteln und spielen. Persönlich fand ich es ein wenig zu teuer, dass war das einzige was mich gestört hat. Ansonsten super.
Besonders für Kinder eine tolle Attraktionen. Hier kann mit dem Ruderboot der Hafen erkundet werden
Simpatico museo interattivo
Morsomt å ta med barna. Kun sommeraktiviteter, men veldig koselig.

I found this really impressive buildings, the whole park is quite large with all those rails to bring that ammunition to the bunkers. woow very cool

The fort was constructed between 1941 and 1944 by the German navy. Together with four other coastal batteries, it formed a part of the Kristiansand Artillery Group. Together with his sister battery at Hanstholm in Denmark, Møvik Fort was built to obstruct Allied naval forces by blocking the Skagerrak strait and the seaways to Eastern Norway, the Kattegatt Bay, the Baltic Sea and the Baltic region for the allied naval forces. Only a field, at nautical miles wide, in the Skagerrak could not be covered by the guns of these facilities. This field was therefore mined.

Adolf Hitler personally worked for the barrier strategy and the decision about the fortress in Hanstholm was made in May 1940. In May 1941, two of the guns in Hanstholm were started in place and on the Norwegian side preparatory work.
Plans for a museum ground in 1984. After extensive renovation work in the late 1980s and early 1990s by local armed forces and the Kristiansand Cannon Museum Møvik, a foundation was laid in 1991, and a part of the fort was opened to the public in 1993. Efforts to restore the 600 mm (1 ft 11 5⁄8 in) narrow gauge funicular railway who once transported the heavy shells are well underway.

The fortress had four gun positions, or which one of the guns is still intact. There are empty gun emplacements and an empty casemate. The 38 cm caliber gun is one of the largest in the world; the barrel alone weighs 110 tons, measures almost 20 m in length and has a range or up to 55 km (34 miles). In the museum, this historic site can be experienced, by following the Fortress Trail - a walk to places and buildings that tell of everyday life in a fortress and national, military events.

Cool place to visit if you're interessted in the second world war. A lot of old memories and bunkers that you can visit.
If you are not so interessted in the second world war, then its a really Nice hiking place with beautiful nature! Had some bad luck when I Visited, because of fog, but you can walk up to a place and then you can see a lot. Exactly what you can see Im not sure, because I didnt see it because of the fog. But apparently its a beautiful view!

Great day out. Lovely staff, very helpful. Gun and whole fortress area is very impressive. Been wanting to come for years, and very happy i finally made it. Anyone interested in Military fortifications will enjoy.

It is a historical place and it should be a museum. But you just leave it as it is. Without restrictons and rules. Like one of your several mountains, raw, and the wheather does the rest and important things: the feeling for time. I am german and this in germany would have been done in to something educational. But this place is just left as it was. Thanks

Well worth the time to head down to Kristiansand and the price of admission. The 'volunteer' collecting entry was very knowledgeable and the views spectacular.
Skip the Autobahn and take the backroads, they are quiet, well paved and very scenic.

This museum has art not seen anywhere else. I strongly recommend it, if you like contemporary art. Start on the third floor and end it with a cup of black coffee which is on its own right a little piece of art.

SKMU er liksom Kristiansands kunstmuseum. Det er lokalisert i gamle Katedralskolen i Skippergata. Akkurat i disse dager er det Weidemann-utstilling. Lokala er noe små, det er lite innsig av normalt lys, noe som har en tendens til å gjøre selv godt hvite lerret gulaktige. Om noen år er det planen å flytte dem til Siloen på kaia. Vi går se om det gjør utstillingslokala bedre.
Vært her mange ganger gjennom mange år, alltid like bra opplevelse! 😁
Flott galleri med barnevennlig opplegg.
Barnas kunstmuseum. Alltid en vinner

Oddernes kirke er byens eldste bygning med deler av kirken fra det fra det 11. århundret.  Jeg synes kirken er vakker og nydelig dekorert.  I tillegg til kirken så er her også et kapell hvor de fleste begravelser, bryllup og dåp gjennomføres. Også en pen bygning med et lite og et større kapell etter hvor mange som kommer.  Og rundt kirken og kapellet er det en stor og vakker kirkegård med en nydelig minnelund hvor man kan sitte og la tankene vandre. For her er det ro og fred. 🙂
Tres surprenant,  merci. Impression de retour en arrière
Synn de ikke klarer å vanne området. Ble ikke gjort før vanningsforbudet heller.
Oddernes kapell .
Situated in the heart of city.Awesome place to hangout with friends. Friends can sit together for long time . Burgers are awesome in taste. All food items are good in taste.
Love to come here, after my coaching classes. It is very nice place for sitting with friends
Well !!!! Who doesn’t know abt Mcdonald 😄❤️ and i think 90% foodies will prefer to take a quick hunger break here. I request those 10% to fill the gap sooner the better 🔥 🔥🔥

It is situated in the Atlantis mall Civil lines......Prayagraj...... 
You all are well aware of the fact that it is a place mostly crowded.... it promotes self service.... the menu is being displayed on the screen above counters.... very limited items are there in this mcD Allahabad...  but it will be freshly prepared and served hot.... drinking water is available for free but one have to ask for it..... its affordable...... one cannot have a cosy atmosphere or a silent atmosphere since its generally over crowded....

I recommend you to taste ice creams...

I would prefer KFC for burgers. But if u want something lite than you ho for it.
The place is always crowded. Try the mcflurry and allu ticki
You can get many option for south east asian foods in this restaurant.. recommended
Best asian food in town
Good value, good wok meals

It's a good Chinese restaurant, it has the classic dishes. But they are a bit sloppy about clearing the tables after people, sometimes resulting in half the tables being free but filled with dirty dishes. Price are too high for the quality.
A cultural institution. Good food and fair prices.
Nice food and nice view.

Not very impressed, the food was good but we were a big party and there were several inconsistencies in the portion sizes. The windows were open and people were smoking right outside. The service was also slow.
Excellent to have a drink but the food does not match the surroundings.
Nice place
Fine lokaler og god atmosfære. Desverre trekker trynefaktor enn hel del ned. Kan ofte ta svært lang tid får man blir betjent i baren.

Great place for casual dining. The food is above average. With great quality meat that is fairly priced.  The atmosphere is on the casual side. And is more fitting for a night out with friend than a romantic date.
Coasy place, delicios food, reasonable prices
Great!
Steak not medium, as I ordered, and tasted like chewing gum... Not going back

Very good service!  Visit the place for the first time when the campaign Eat for 100 nok was on. Beef with pepper sauce was more like pepper sauce with slightly steamed vegetables, can't taste the beef at all. I am giving it 3 stars because of the friendly people working there.
A cozy place with beautiful views of the fjord and marina. The food is really good, albeit on the pricey side. Be aware the menu is very small as they offer only a few main courses.
Great ambience and location.. Reservations recommended..
Awesome service and perfect wine. We were the first guests of the season 2019 and were welcomed.
Food was good, when it finally came. Deer tender, but small portion. Kind of on the expensive side, $40+ for main course.
We ate absolutely amazing mussels. The resturant is located right on the water so you have an amazing view to your meal. Nice service.
